short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate what you need on your final exam to maintain the grade you want with this simple extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a student in high school/college???
Install this extension, and figure out exactly what you need on an exam so that you can maintain your grade.
